text: Don't delete this article because this actor/actress will play a main role in the upcoming series Kamen Rider Ex-Aid, and will be active and notable later on. is a Japanese actor who is freelance. He was previously represented with Top Coat. ==Biography== Matsumoto was chosen as one of Top Coat's 20th Anniversary Audition artists on 2014. His acting debut was in the tokusatsu series Ultraman X on 2015. On 2016, Matsumoto appeared in another tokusatsu series Kamen Rider Ex-Aid as Taiga Hanaya/Kamen Rider Snipe, who is 8 years older than him, and his first time becoming a tokusatsu hero. ==Filmography== ===TV series=== {|class="wikitable" |- !
